definitions: Obscenity is behaviour, art, or language that is sexual and offends or shocks people.
An obscenity is a very offensive word or expression.
If you refer to an action or event as an obscenity, you disapprove of it very strongly and consider it to be offensive or immoral.
the state or quality of being obscene
an obscene act, statement, word, etc
the state or quality of being obscene
an obscene remark, act, event, etc.
the character or quality of being obscene; indecency; lewdness
something obscene, as a picture or story
an obscene word or expression, esp. when used as an invective
